title: Vampires: Stories of the Supernatural
description: Contains:A preface by the translator Fedor Nikanov"The Vampire/Upyr" (Упырь, 1841)"The Family of the Vourdalak" (La famille du vourdalak [French] (1838)) "The Reunion after Three Hundred Years" (Le rendez-vous dans trois cent ans [French] (1912)) posthumously "Amena" (Амена (1846) )
author: Aleksey Konstantinovich Tolstoy
